downloadTitle: 2007 Office System Demo: Project Tracking Application Template Comparison
downloadDescription: This click-through flash demo compares the out-of-the-box project tracking template applications from Lotus Domino and Microsoft Windows SharePoint Services 3.0, and shows how the integrated platform of SharePoint and Microsoft Office can create a more streamlined project management process.
detailsSection: This click-through flash demo compares the out-of-the-box project tracking template applications from Lotus Domino and Windows SharePoint Services 3.0, and shows how the integrated platform of SharePoint and Office can create a more streamlined project management process.   The demo shows how common project functions, such as task assignments and meeting management, are performed using the "Team Room" from Lotus Domino and the new "Project Tracking" template from Windows SharePoint Services 3.0.  The demo also highlights the ability to setup a central project tracking repository in SharePoint for upper level managers to view timeline and milestone summaries of different projects in a single interface.
systemRequirementsSection:
• This download relates with the following Office program:
    • 2007 Microsoft Office system
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:

  1. Download the file by clicking the Download button (above) and saving the file to your hard disk.
  2. Double-click the OfficeSystem2007_ProjectTrackingTemplateComparisonDemo.msi program file on your hard disk to start the Setup program.
  3. Follow the instructions on the screen to complete the installation.
Instructions for use:

  • To launch this demo, click the Start menu, point to All Programs, point to Microsoft Office System Demos, point to this demo, and then click Launch Demo.

To remove this download:

  • On the Start menu, point to All Programs, point to Microsoft Office System Demos, point to this demo, and then click Uninstall Demo.
